short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Happy Bubble shooter, shoot all bubbles and combinations of 3 or more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Happy Bubble Shooter is the newest game from bubbleshooter.net. The goal is to clear the field of all bubbles, you can do this by making combinations of 3 or more bubbles to clear them. Repeat this until all bubbles are gone and you win the game. In the bottom left you will find your miss counter, if you shoot a bubble and don't make a combination one bubble of your miss counter is retracted. If your miss counter is empty a new line of bubbles will form on the top. So watch out that you don't miss too often.
